Neon Void 1984

Coming August 7–9, 2026

Experience a descent into the depths of cosmic horror in the shadow of the Cold War with Neon Void ‘84, a Nordic larp about the founding of a twisted science cult—in the pursuit of the unknown, how far are you willing to go?

Neon Void is a weekend-long horror larp set in 1984 about a secret Cold War research project that stumbles upon extra-dimensional horrors. Participants portray researchers who transform into cultists as they embrace the cosmic unknown.

📅 Tentative Dates:

August 7–9, 2026

📍 Location:

Cambridge, MA, near the Massachusetts Institute of Technology

💵 Ticket Price:

Estimated $800-900 (early bird discounts, payment plans, and scholarships available)

🛌 Lodging:

Partner hotels at discounted rates

🍽️ Food:

Lunch and dinner included; dietary needs accommodated

🍷 Age Requirement:

21+
